title: Michelle Wolf | Trump Supporters Think He Deserves the Nobel Peace Prize: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president violating the Iran deal, his CIA director nominee being grilled on her past involvement in torture and Trump's supporters calling for him to win the Nobel Peace Prize.

Then, Late Night alum Michelle Wolf talks about her White House Correspondents' Dinner performance, running a 50-mile race in Utah and preparing for her Netflix show, The Break.

After that, Michelle talks to producer Kevin Miller backstage at Studio 8G.
